name: AMERICAN AIRLINES INC
sampleDescriptions: FAA Reauthorization; passenger facility charges; Fair Fees Act; Continuing Resolution for 2018(provisions related to commercial aviation); Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2018 (provisions related to commercial aviation); and economic, operational and management performance of American Airlines Group.
